title: Morning Pulse 12-12-24
text:
Updated: 10 hours ago
Meteorologists are closely monitoring conditions that could lead to hazardous winter storms, along with an elevated risk for ice jams along rivers and streams.
Updated: Dec. 11, 2024 at 11:36 AM CST
Authorities request assistance in locating two females who stole $2,000 worth of merchandise from North Platte's Bomgaars. And, a North Platte Native is inducted into the College Football Hall of Fame
Updated: Dec. 11, 2024 at 5:00 AM CST
The yearly tradition started in the early 1900s in California to help with feeding programs.

Updated: Dec. 11, 2024 at 5:00 AM CST
Holiday shopping and gift-giving can often be challenging, but even more so when shopping for a person living with dementia.
Updated: Dec. 10, 2024 at 5:39 PM CST
Tara Tilford was arrested for fraudulently using prescription pads to get more than a dozen oxycodone prescriptions.
